title: Studio Paris Panoramic view - For rent
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


On the 32nd floor, spacious studio, recently renovated, with a panoramic view of Paris and its monuments (Montmartre, Dôme des Invalides, Cathédrale Notre-Dame de Paris, Tour Montmarnasse, ...). 

It is composed of an entrance (shoe closet, wardrobe), a bathroom (bathtub, toilet, washing machine), a kitchen (hotplates, microwave oven), a bedroom (wallbed, smart TV, desk) and a living room (sofa bed). 

Crockery, sheets and towels are provided, as well as cleaning equipment. Located near Beaugrenelle, it is close to all shops and amenities (supermarkets, bakery, hairdresser, shopping center within 100 meters). 

Services: 
- Wifi access included (fibre-optic internet connection). 
- Collective heating and hot water. 
- 24 hour security guard. 
- Elevators. 

Metro/RER: Charles Michel (line 10), Bir Hakeim-Duplex (line 6), Javel (RER C).

Rent: 1 590€/month including charges.

Garantme only.

Please note that the elevator goes until the 30th floor. Then, there are stairs to go up to the 32nd.
